nodes.documentation:
@title A contract for managing special access privileges.
 @author Heriberto Prieto
nodes.name: AccessControl

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCEO The address of the new CEO.
nodes.name: setCEO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCFO The address of the new CFO.
nodes.name: setCFO

nodes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCOO The address of the new COO.
nodes.name: setCOO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Called by any "C-Level" role to pause the contract. Used only when
  a bug or exploited is detected and we need to limit damage.
nodes.name: pause
unpause

attributes.documentation:
@title A contract for managing special access privileges.
 @author Heriberto Prieto
attributes.name: AccessControl

attributes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCEO The address of the new CEO.
attributes.name: setCEO

 @param _newCFO The address of the new CFO.
attributes.name: setCFO

attributes.documentation:
@dev Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.
 @param _newCOO The address of the new COO.
attributes.name: setCOO

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation:
@dev Called by any "C-Level" role to pause the contract. Used only when
  a bug or exploited is detected and we need to limit damage.
attributes.name: pause
unpause

devdoc.author: Heriberto Prieto

pause().details: Called by any "C-Level" role to pause the contract. Used only when  a bug or exploited is detected and we need to limit damage.

setCEO(address).details: Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.

params._newCEO: The address of the new CEO.

setCFO(address).details: Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.

params._newCFO: The address of the new CFO.

setCOO(address).details: Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.

params._newCOO: The address of the new COO.

unpause().details: Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are  compromised.

devdoc.title: A contract for managing special access privileges.

unpause().notice: This is public rather than external so it can be called by  derived contracts.
